room_title: Escape room "Murder at Mystery Manor" by Escape from Mystery Manor in Boise
room_description: The sudden and mysterious death of an eccentric millionaire has forced his potential heirs to hastily gather in a secluded mountain hotel to announce the last will of he deceased. The raging bad weather temporarily cuts them off from the outer world, leaving them with no connection and no opportunity to leave the ill fated place. However, not all of them were disappointed by this fact. The cold blooded killer who was responsible for the death of the “moneybags” has decided to use this opportunity...
